25.movie_plot: Military lawyer Lieutenant Daniel Kaffee defends Marines accused of murder. They contend they were acting under orders.

156.movie_plot: Robbie, a singer, and Julia, a waitress, are both engaged, but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.

184.movie_plot: Denice Crosby takes a first look at the huge fans of Star Trek and how the series from around America has affected and shaped their lives.

233.movie_plot: A noble underachiever and a beautiful valedictorian fall in love the summer before she goes off to college.

19.movie_plot: Atticus Finch, a lawyer in the Depression-era South, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his children against prejudice.

93.movie_plot: Incompetent police detective Frank Drebin must foil an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II.

51.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)

124.movie_plot: An examination of the machinations behind the scenes at a real estate office.

159.movie_plot: A prepubescent chess prodigy refuses to harden himself in order to become a champion like the famous but unlikable Bobby Fischer.

242.movie_plot: A family's home is haunted by a host of ghosts.
